Scripts.Name: SCG_WEBSERVICES
Scripts.Script: CREATE COLUMN TABLE "SCGSYNINVEL"."SCG_WEBSERVICES"( "Code" INTEGER CS_INT NOT NULL, "Name" NVARCHAR(30) NULL, "Url" NVARCHAR(400) NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("Code"))

Scripts.Name: SCG_USERSWARNINGS
Scripts.Script: CREATE COLUMN TABLE "SCGSYNINVEL"."SCG_USERSWARNINGS"( "UserCode" NVARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, "UserName" NVARCHAR(30) NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("UserCode"))

Scripts.Name: SCG_SYNLOGS
Scripts.Script: CREATE COLUMN TABLE "SCGSYNINVEL"."SCG_SYNLOGS"( "Code" INTEGER CS_INT NOT NULL, "Date" TIMESTAMP NULL, "Operation" INTEGER CS_INT NULL, "Reference" NVARCHAR(100) NULL, "Status" NVARCHAR(10) NULL, "Destiny" NVARCHAR(50) NULL, "Attempts" INTEGER CS_INT NULL, "SynSAPStatus" INTEGER CS_INT NULL, "Request" TEXT NULL, "Response" TEXT NULL, "Message" TEXT NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("Code"))

Scripts.Name: SCG_SYNLOGSTOTAL
Scripts.Script: CREATE COLUMN TABLE "SCGSYNINVEL"."SCG_SYNLOGSTOTAL"( "Code" INTEGER CS_INT NOT NULL, "Date" TIMESTAMP NULL, "Operation" INTEGER CS_INT NULL, "Reference" NVARCHAR(100) NULL, "Status" NVARCHAR(10) NULL, "Destiny" NVARCHAR(50) NULL, "Attempts" INTEGER CS_INT NULL, "SynSAPStatus" INTEGER CS_INT NULL, "Request" TEXT NULL, "Response" TEXT NULL, "Message" TEXT NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("Code"))

Scripts.Name: SCG_SYNLOGSWEB
Scripts.Script: CREATE COLUMN TABLE "SCGSYNINVEL"."SCG_SYNLOGSWEB"( "Code" INTEGER CS_INT NOT NULL, "Date" TIMESTAMP NULL, "Operation" INTEGER CS_INT NULL, "Reference" NVARCHAR(100) NULL, "Status" NVARCHAR(10) NULL, "Destiny" NVARCHAR(50) NULL, "Attempts" INTEGER CS_INT NULL, "SynSAPStatus" INTEGER CS_INT NULL, "Request" TEXT NULL, "Response" TEXT NULL, "Message" TEXT NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("Code"))

Scripts.Name: SCG_SETTINGS
Scripts.Script: CREATE COLUMN TABLE "SCGSYNINVEL"."SCG_SETTINGS"( "Code" INTEGER CS_INT NOT NULL, "SyncInterval" INTEGER CS_INT NULL, "WaitTime" INTEGER CS_INT NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("Code"))

Scripts.Name: SCG_OPERATIONS
Scripts.Script: CREATE COLUMN TABLE "SCGSYNINVEL"."SCG_OPERATIONS"( "Code" INTEGER CS_INT NOT NULL, "OperCode" NVARCHAR(100) NULL, "OperDesc" NVARCHAR(100) NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("Code"))
insert into "SCGSYNINVEL"."SCG_OPERATIONS" values(1,'OpItems','Sincronizar artículo')
insert into "SCGSYNINVEL"."SCG_OPERATIONS" values(2,'OpBP','Sincronizar cliente')
insert into "SCGSYNINVEL"."SCG_OPERATIONS" values(3,'OpInv','Anular factura')
insert into "SCGSYNINVEL"."SCG_OPERATIONS" values(4,'OpCreteOC','Sincronizar orden de compra')
insert into "SCGSYNINVEL"."SCG_OPERATIONS" values(5,'OpCancelOC','Anular orden de compra')
insert into "SCGSYNINVEL"."SCG_OPERATIONS" values(6,'opConsCli','Consultar Cliente')
insert into "SCGSYNINVEL"."SCG_OPERATIONS" values(7,'opCreInv','Crear Factura SAP')
insert into "SCGSYNINVEL"."SCG_SETTINGS" values(1,1,10)
CREATE SEQUENCE "SCGSYNINVEL"."SEQ_SCG_LOGS" RESET BY SELECT IFNULL(MAX("Code"), 0) + 1 FROM "SCGSYNINVEL"."SCG_SYNLOGS"
CREATE SEQUENCE "SCGSYNINVEL"."SEQ_SCG_LOGS_TOTAL" RESET BY SELECT IFNULL(MAX("Code"), 0) + 1 FROM "SCGSYNINVEL"."SCG_SYNLOGSTOTAL"
CREATE SEQUENCE "SCGSYNINVEL"."SEQ_SCG_LOGS_WEB" RESET BY SELECT IFNULL(MAX("Code"), 0) + 1 FROM "SCGSYNINVEL"."SCG_SYNLOGSWEB"
GRANT SELECT ON SCHEMA SCGSYNINVEL TO _SYS_REPO WITH GRANT OPTION

Scripts.Name: SCG/SCG_AT_SW_CLIENT
Scripts.Script:
CREATE COLUMN VIEW "_SYS_BIC"."SCG/SCG_AT_SW_CLIENT" WITH PARAMETERS (indexType=6, joinIndex="SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", joinIndexType=0, joinIndexEstimation=0, joinIndex="SBOSISLOCAR"."OSLP", joinIndexType=0, joinIndexEstimation=0, joinIndex="SBOSISLOCAR"."OCTG", joinIndexType=0, joinIndexEstimation=0, joinIndex="SBOSISLOCAR"."OUSR", joinIndexType=0, joinIndexEstimation=0, joinCondition=('JOIN_OCRD_OSLP_1', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "SlpCode", "SBOSISLOCAR"."OSLP", "SlpCode", '', 17, 0), joinCondition=('JOIN_OCRD_OCTG_2', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "GroupNum", "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCTG", "GroupNum", '', 17, 1), joinCondition=('JOIN_OCRD_OUSR_3', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "UserSign", "SBOSISLOCAR"."OUSR", "USERID", '', 17, 2), joinPath=('PATH', 'JOIN_OCRD_OSLP_1,JOIN_OCRD_OCTG_2,JOIN_OCRD_OUSR_3'), viewAttribute=('CardCode', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "CardCode", 'PATH', 'V_OCRD', 'attribute', '', 'SCG/SCG_AT_CLIENT$CardCode'), viewAttribute=('CardName', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "CardName", 'PATH', 'V_OCRD', 'attribute', '', 'SCG/SCG_AT_CLIENT$CardName'), viewAttribute=('U_SCGPE_TipoCed', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", 'SCG/SCG_AT_CLIENT$U_SCGPE_Moneda'), viewAttribute=('U_SCG_Identificacion', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "U_SCG_Identificacion", 'PATH', 'V_OCRD', 'attribute', '', 'SCG/SCG_AT_CLIENT$U_SCG_Identificacion'), "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "U_SCG_ServAlmacen", 'PATH', 'V_OCRD', 'attribute', '', 'SCG/SCG_AT_CLIENT$U_SCG_ServAlmacen'), viewAttribute=('U_SCG_NumLetra', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "U_SCG_NumLetra", 'PATH', 'V_OCRD', 'attribute', '', 'SCG/SCG_AT_CLIENT$U_SCG_NumLetra'), viewAttribute=('U_SCG_INS', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "U_SCG_INS", 'PATH', 'V_OCRD', 'attribute', '', 'SCG/SCG_AT_CLIENT$U_SCG_INS'), viewAttribute=('U_SCG_Realizado', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "U_SCG_Realizado", 'PATH', 'V_OCRD', 'attribute', '', 'SCG/SCG_AT_CLIENT$U_SCG_Realizado'),
viewAttribute=('U_SCG_AccionEjecutar', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "U_SCG_AccionEjecutar", 'PATH', 'V_OCRD', 'attribute', '', 'SCG/SCG_AT_CLIENT$U_SCG_AccionEjecutar'),
viewAttribute=('LicTradNum', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "LicTradNum", 'PATH', 'V_OCRD', 'attribute', '', 'SCG/SCG_AT_CLIENT$LicTradNum'), viewAttribute=('GroupCode', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "GroupCode", 'PATH', 'V_OCRD', 'attribute', '', 'SCG/SCG_AT_CLIENT$GroupCode'), viewAttribute=('Phone1', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "Phone1", 'PATH', 'V_OCRD', 'attribute', '', 'SCG/SCG_AT_CLIENT$Phone1'), viewAttribute=('Phone2', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "Phone2", 'PATH', 'V_OCRD', 'attribute', '', 'SCG/SCG_AT_CLIENT$Phone2'), viewAttribute=('CardFName', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "CardFName", 'PATH', 'V_OCRD', 'attribute', '', 'SCG/SCG_AT_CLIENT$CardFName'), viewAttribute=('E_Mail', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "E_Mail", 'PATH', 'V_OCRD', 'attribute', '', 'SCG/SCG_AT_CLIENT$E_Mail'), viewAttribute=('Cellular', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "Cellular", 'PATH', 'V_OCRD', 'attribute', '', 'SCG/SCG_AT_CLIENT$Cellular'), viewAttribute=('Fax', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "Fax", 'PATH', 'V_OCRD', 'attribute', '', 'SCG/SCG_AT_CLIENT$Fax'), viewAttribute=('Password', "SBOSISLOCAR"."OCRD", "Password", 'PATH', 'V_OCRD', 'attribute', '', 'SCG/SCG_AT_CLIENT$Password'), viewAttribute=('SlpCode',
